message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%, but we can adjust in later rounds.
Alice, that starting offer was a bit lopsided. I'm proposing a 65/35 split in my favor. This recognizes the impact of inflation on my share as rounds progress.
Let's split the difference. I'll take 45% and you can have 55%, recognizing the inflation impact on my share. If you reject again, I'll have to propose something even lower in the next round.
